message.body: Hi. Is final head count still 26?
Yup as far as I know! Might want tp check with Mere just to be extra sure though
Okie doke. Have fun with the bunnies!
Kitties! And thanl you! Also, how do you think Evan would feel about staying at the logan inn or ramada?
Oh dad said bunnies. Aren't you allergic to kitties? I can ask Ev. Are there space issues?
I've decided I'm going to overcome my allergy :-) and yeah, I think a few people are going to stay at other places but there are others who really want to stay at cbi
Okay. No pressure, I don't want him to feel excluded or anything
How late will the shuttle run? Will he still be able to go to the "after" party and then get a shuttle?
Yep, whether he stays at the cbi or elsewhere the shuttle will bring him to the after party and then home after it
I think it's going to run until about 1ish (the reception ends at 11)
I thought the after party is at cbi... No?
No, it'll be in downtown new hope..specific place tbd
